title: Arts/Humanities
description: Department of Arts and Humanities at Post Graduate College Timeragara offers various undergraduate and postgraduate degree programs in the fields of literature, languages, history, philosophy, and other related subjects.

title: BS Botany
description: The Department of Botany at Post Graduate College Timeragara offers undergraduate degree programs in the field of botany which includes the study of plants and their structures, growth, and development, as well as their relationship with the environment.

title: BS Chemistry
description: The Department of Chemistry at Post Graduate College Timeragara offers undergraduate degree programs in the field of chemistry which includes the study of matter, its properties, composition, and behavior, as well as the changes it undergoes during chemical reactions.

title: BS Computer Science
description: The Department of Computer Science at Post Graduate College Timeragara offers undergraduate and postgraduate degree programs in the field of computer science which includes the study of algorithms, programming languages, software development, and computer systems.

title: BS Economics
description: The Department of Economics at Post Graduate College Timeragara offers undergraduate degree programs in the field of economics which includes the study of production, distribution, and consumption of goods and services, as well as economic policies and systems.

title: BS English
description: The Department of English at Post Graduate College Timeragara offers undergraduate degree programs in the field of English language and literature which includes the study of literature, language, linguistics, and critical analysis of various literary works.

title: BS Health & Physical Education
description: The Department of Health and Physical Education at Post Graduate College Timeragara offers undergraduate degree programs in the field of health and physical education which includes the study of physical fitness, sports science, and health education.

title: BS History
description: The Department of History at Post Graduate College Timeragara offers undergraduate degree programs in the field of history which includes the study of human past events and their impact on society and culture, as well as historical research methods and analysis.

title: BS Islamic Studies
description: The Department of Islamic Studies at Post Graduate College Timeragara offers undergraduate degree programs in the field of Islamic studies which includes the study of Quran, Hadith, Islamic history, and jurisprudence.

title: BS Mathematics
description: The Department of Mathematics at Post Graduate College Timeragara offers undergraduate degree programs in the field of mathematics which includes the study of numbers, quantities, and shapes, as well as their relationships and properties.

title: BS Zoology
